קַ֧ח <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵז֛וֹר <WH232> the girdle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which קָנִ֖יתָ <WH7069> that thou hast got אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is around מָתְנֶ֑יךָ <WH4975> which [is] upon thy loins וְקוּם֙ <WH6965> and arise לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go פְּרָ֔תָה <WH6578> to Euphrates וְטָמְנֵ֥הוּ <WH2934> and hide שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בִּנְקִ֥יק <WH5357> it there in a hole הַסָּֽלַע׃ <WH5553> of the rock
וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <WH1980> went וָאֶטְמְנֵ֖הוּ <WH2934> and hid בִּפְרָ֑ת <WH6578> it by Euphrates כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אוֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> to pass מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass after יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me ק֚וּם <WH6965> unto me Arise לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go פְּרָ֔תָה <WH6578> to Euphrates וְקַ֤ח <WH3947> and take מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֵז֔וֹר <WH232> the girdle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֖יךָ <WH6680> from thence which I commanded לְטָמְנוֹ־ <WH2934> thee to hide שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּ֠כָה <WH3602> Just אַשְׁחִ֞ית <WH7843> After this manner will I mar אֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֧וֹן <WH1347> the pride יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֥וֹן <WH1347> pride יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הָרָֽב׃ <WH7227> and the great

הָעָם֩ <WH5971> people הַזֶּ֨ה <WH2088> he הָרָ֜ע <WH7451> This evil הַֽמֵּאֲנִ֣ים ׀ <WH3987> which refuse לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> to hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַ֗י <WH1697> my words הַהֹֽלְכִים֙ <WH1980> which walk בִּשְׁרִר֣וּת <WH8307> in the imagination לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> of their heart וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> gone אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <WH5647> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <WH7812> them and to worship לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וִיהִי֙ <WH1961> become כָּאֵז֣וֹר <WH232> them shall even be as this girdle הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִצְלַ֖ח <WH6743> which is good לַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> is totally

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after יִדְבַּ֨ק <WH1692> cleaveth הָאֵז֜וֹר <WH232> For as the girdle אֶל־ <WH413> to מָתְנֵי־ <WH4975> to the loins אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> of a man כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so הִדְבַּ֣קְתִּי <WH1692> so have I caused to cleave אֵ֠לַי <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> unto me the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> and the whole house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> that they might be unto me for a people וּלְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and for a name וְלִתְהִלָּ֖ה <WH8416> and for a praise וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <WH8597> and for a glory וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> not שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> but they would not hear

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> Therefore thou shalt speak אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> unto them this word הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> he ס כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> Every נֵ֖בֶל <WH5035> Every bottle יִמָּ֣לֵא <WH4390> shall be filled יָ֑יִן <WH3196> with wine וְאָמְר֣וּ <WH559> and they shall say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you הֲיָדֹ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> unto thee Do we not certainly לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that כָל־ <WH3605> every נֵ֖בֶל <WH5035> that every bottle יִמָּ֥לֵא <WH4390> shall be filled יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> banqueting

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> Then shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am about מְמַלֵּ֣א <WH4390> Behold I will fill אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> all the inhabitants הָאָ֪רֶץ <WH776> of this land הַזֹּ֟את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> even the kings הַיֹּשְׁבִים֩ <WH3427> that sit לְדָוִ֨ד <WH1732> upon David's עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <WH3678> throne וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> and the priests וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <WH5030> and the prophets וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem שִׁכָּרֽוֹן׃ <WH7943> with drunkenness

וְנִפַּצְתִּים֩ <WH5310> And I will dash אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> them one אֶל־ <WH413> against אָחִ֜יו <WH251> against another וְהָאָב֧וֹת <WH1> even the fathers וְהַבָּנִ֛ים <WH1121> and the sons יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֶחְמ֧וֹל <WH2550> I will not pity וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אָח֛וּס <WH2347> nor spare וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor אֲרַחֵ֖ם <WH7355> nor have mercy מֵהַשְׁחִיתָֽם׃ <WH7843> but destroy ס
שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear וְהַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <WH238> ye and give ear אַל־ <WH408> not תִּגְבָּ֑הוּ <WH1361> be not proud כִּ֥י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken

תְּנוּ֩ <WH5414> Give לַיהוָ֨ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֤ם <WH430> your God כָּבוֹד֙ <WH3519> glory בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> Before יַחְשִׁ֔ךְ <WH2821> before he cause darkness וּבְטֶ֛רֶם <WH2962> and before יִֽתְנַגְּפ֥וּ <WH5062> stumble רַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7272> and before your feet עַל־ <WH5921> and הָ֣רֵי <WH2022> mountains נָ֑שֶׁף <WH5399> upon the dark וְקִוִּיתֶ֤ם <WH6960> and while ye look לְאוֹר֙ <WH216> for light וְשָׂמָ֣הּ <WH7760> he turn לְצַלְמָ֔וֶת <WH6757> it into the shadow of death [יָשִׁית כ] (וְשִׁ֖ית <WH7896> apply ק) לַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> [it] gross darkness

וְאִם֙ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמָע֔וּהָ <WH8085> But if ye will not hear בְּמִסְתָּרִ֥ים <WH4565> in secret places תִּבְכֶּֽה־ <WH1058> shall weep נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> it my soul מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> for גֵוָ֑ה <WH1466> [your] pride וְדָמֹ֨עַ <WH1830> shall weep תִּדְמַ֜ע <WH1830> sore וְתֵרַ֤ד <WH3381> and run down עֵינִי֙ <WH5869> and mine eye דִּמְעָ֔ה <WH1832> with tears כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <WH7617> is carried away captive עֵ֥דֶר <WH5739> flock יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> because the LORD'S ס

For the greatness עֲוֹנֵ֛ךְ <WH5771> of thine iniquity נִגְל֥וּ <WH1540> discovered שׁוּלַ֖יִךְ <WH7757> are thy skirts נֶחְמְס֥וּ <WH2554> made bare עֲקֵבָֽיִךְ׃ <WH6119> [and] thy heels

הֲיַהֲפֹ֤ךְ <WH2015> change כּוּשִׁי֙ <WH3569> Can the Ethiopian עוֹר֔וֹ <WH5785> his skin וְנָמֵ֖ר <WH5246> or the leopard חֲבַרְבֻּרֹתָ֑יו <WH2272> spot גַּם־ <WH1571> again אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you תּוּכְל֣וּ <WH3201> can לְהֵיטִ֔יב <WH3190> ye also do good לִמֻּדֵ֖י <WH3928> that are accustomed הָרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7489> to do evil
וַאֲפִיצֵ֖ם <WH6327> Therefore will I scatter כְּקַשׁ־ <WH7179> them as the stubble עוֹבֵ֑ר <WH5674> that passeth away לְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> by the wind מִדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This גוֹרָלֵ֧ךְ <WH1486> This [is] thy lot מְנָת־ <WH4490> the portion מִדַּ֛יִךְ <WH4055> of thy measures מֵֽאִתִּ֖י <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> from me saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> Because שָׁכַ֣חַתְּ <WH7911> because thou hast forgotten אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַֽתִּבְטְחִ֖י <WH982> me and trusted בַּשָּֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> in falsehood

וְגַם־ <WH1571> have also אֲנִ֛י <WH589> Myself חָשַׂ֥פְתִּי <WH2834> Therefore will I discover שׁוּלַ֖יִךְ <WH7757> thy skirts עַל־ <WH5921> over פָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH6440> upon thy face וְנִרְאָ֖ה <WH7200> may appear קְלוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <WH7036> that thy shame

נִֽאֻפַ֤יִךְ <WH5004> thine adulteries וּמִצְהֲלוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4684> and thy neighings זִמַּ֣ת <WH2154> the lewdness זְנוּתֵ֔ךְ <WH2184> of thy whoredom עַל־ <WH5921> on גְּבָעוֹת֙ <WH1389> on the hills בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the fields רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I have seen שִׁקּוּצָ֑יִךְ <WH8251> [and] thine abominations א֥וֹי <WH188> Woe לָךְ֙ יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> unto thee O Jerusalem לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִטְהֲרִ֔י <WH2891> wilt thou not be made clean אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after that מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How עֹֽד׃ <WH5750> again פ
